title: Wasn't Heartseeker Supposed to Be...
body:
for champions with bows? And crossbows, I suppose? You know, for the association with cupid? 

I don't have much of a problem with Ori getting a valentine's skin (though, that hair...) but wouldn't it make more sense as a Sweetheart skin? As far as I can tell, they're functionally the same thing.

But Ori is fully covered?
Not only that,Sona isn't fully covered so it would actually appear like the opposite.
That was my assumption BEFORE today's update.Now I'm just confused.

I'd imagine they're just varied names for skins within the same AU, like how the Slaughter Fleet skins are Rogue Admiral Garen, Corsair Quinn, Sea Hunter Aatrox, etc. They naming is meant to mean they have some sort of different part to play in that world or something. I dunno, that seems logical to me so I'ma stick with it.

Also for the record, I don't think anyone anywhere at Riot ever said any skin line was restricted to a certain kind of champion.
